item.description:
Location: Taste of India on Wickenden Street is our tentative meetup location for June's event. I say tentative because it's a pretty small place, and even though it's not usually crowded for lunch if there are too many of use we may not all fit. If the RSVP list gets too big we may have to seek another location. But for now this is it. The lunch buffet is great - plenty of choices for both vegetarians and omnivores - or you can order off the menu. You can view the menu online at http://tinyurl.com/2u...

Discussion: Open format as usual. Feel free to suggest any other topics on our mailing list: webdesign-410@meetup.com

If you're attending this event, consider making a donation towards the monthly cost of running our group website. All donations are optional and there is no required fee for any of our monthly events. You can submit your donation via PayPal or to Chris on the day of the event.

group.name: Providence Web Development Lunch Hour Meetup Group

item.name: PWDLH June Meetup
